text: Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Keiten'notami yo. Rippō to fukuin to nushi kara anata gata ni kudasa reta,(subete no) keiji o junshu suru made wa, anata gata ga tatsu yoridokoro wa nai noda.' Tokoroga omo kara anata ni kudatta mono wa, kare-ra no ōku no mono ni, gankona hankō to, fushinjin o zōchō sa seta. Dakara anata wa fushinjin no min ni tsuite, kokoro o nayama shite wa naranai
